alert.note: Alert for Bellevue and Vicinity; Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity; Western Skagit County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 7:52AM PST until February 22 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to 2 inches of snowfall along the east side of Puget Sound. * WHERE...Lowlands of western Skagit County, including Cypress Island, Guemes Island, Anacortes, Mount Vernon, and La Conner, Everett and vicinity, including Stanwood, Marysville, and Mountlake Terrace, Bellevue and vicinity, including Mill Creek, Kenmore, Kirkland, and Issaquah and Seattle and vicinity, including Shoreline, Vashon Island, Mercer Island, White Center, Kent, and Algona. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel during the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bellevue and Vicinity; Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity; Western Skagit County
